projects_list.title: Ragiliawanputraa's Portofolio Website
projects_list.description: A modern portfolio website built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

projects_list.title: Sentinova - Summarization & Sentiment Analysis
projects_list.description: Sentinova is a web-based platform for text summarization and sentiment analysis, powered by a custom-trained machine learning system. It automatically processes product reviews to generate concise summaries and detect the sentiment behind the text in a simple, user-friendly interface.
projects_list.category: Web Development, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Data Mining
